note.p: Birth: Swaffham Prior, Cambridgeshire, England (25 March 1804)
Baptism: St Mary's Church, Swaffham Prior (23 May 1805)
Death: 22 Princes Terrace, Hyde Park, London (20 February 1869)
Burial: St Mary's Church, Swaffham Prior, Cambridgeshire
Memorial inscription in Church of St Mary and St Michael, Trumptington, Cambridgeshire
Career: Naval branch of the HEIC; House Surgeon, Bedford County Infirmary; Physician Bedford Infirmary; Mayor of Bedford (1834); emigrated to New South Wales, worked as a surgeon, then as a banker
